page.title: 06Entertainment
page.content: ENTERTAINMENT The Majestic cinema closed down in 1983 but it has reopened as an entertainment centre this year (1985) Discos are held every week.An antique fair is held every Sunday.There are numerous clubs in the town e. g. British Legion,Conservative,Tanybont. An eisteddfod(a Welsh competitive event) is held annually in the town. There are theatre groups connected with the chapels and churches.Seilo chapel has its own theatre. There are English Language theatrical groups such as the White Slipper Company. There is a bowling green,tennis courts, putting green and a full length golf course on the west side of the river Seiont.(opposite to the castle.)The town soccer team gained promotion to the Northen Premier League this year.
